##Load Libraries
```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(pipeR)
library(knitr)
library(xml2)
library(htmltab)
library(dplyr)
```

##Advanced PBP
```{r}
AdvancedPBP <- htmltab("https://widgets.sports-reference.com/wg.fcgi?css=1&site=bbr&url=%2Fteams%2FBOS%2F2018.html&div=div_advanced")

head(AdvancedPBP)

AdvancedPBP <- AdvancedPBP %>% 
  mutate(Team = "BOS") %>% 
  rename(Player = V1) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-Rk)

```
